title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Park Newspaper
body: Oklahoma Update         Oklahoma Update Volume:1 Number:1   The Oklahoma Update is the official newsletter of the national park units in the State of Oklahoma. Published twice yearly, the newsletter provides partners, stakeholders and park visitors with insight into park operations and events. The newsletter is available on the park website, via email, or through a traditional mailing list. Please contact Washita Battlefield National Historic Site if you are interested in receiving future issues of the Update.       Summer 2014      Spring 2013      Spring 2012      Fall 2011      Winter 2011      Summer 2010      Winter 2010      Summer 2009
